mapper.sql: a.clinic_date AS "clinicDate", a.clinic_label AS "clinicLabel", a.time_desc AS "timeDesc", a.registration_limits AS "registrationLimits", a.appointment_limits AS "appointmentLimits", a.current_no AS "currentNo", a.registration_num AS "registrationNum", a.appointment_num AS "appointmentNum", a.regist_price AS "registPrice"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clinic_for_regist( clinic_date, clinic_label, time_desc, registration_limits, appointment_limits, current_no, registration_num, appointment_num, regist_price ) VALUES ( #{clinicDate}, #{clinicLabel}, #{timeDesc}, #{registrationLimits}, #{appointmentLimits}, #{currentNo}, #{registrationNum}, #{appointmentNum}, #{registPrice} )
mapper.update: UPDATE clinic_for_regist SET clinic_date = #{clinicDate}, clinic_label = #{clinicLabel}, time_desc = #{timeDesc}, registration_limits = #{registrationLimits}, appointment_limits = #{appointmentLimits}, current_no = #{currentNo}, registration_num = #{registrationNum}, appointment_num = #{appointmentNum}, regist_price = #{registPrice} WHERE id = #{id}
